way I wanted... I was a little upset, basically, because... we lost.'' Speaking at the Pro Bowl, Reggie Wayne told reporters that seeing Peyton Manning throw 11 interceptions during a three-game losing streak was a shock. The main thing we realized, he's not immortal. He's real. He's not a machine. It goes to show you this game is so competitive, even the guys on top can hit a wall somewhere. In Philadelphia, Michael Vick not only hit the wall, he spent a couple of years behind them in a prison cell. Mike Pence said the decision to pursue QE2 is an example of the failure of the current policy that mandates the Federal Reserve focus on full employment and inflation. Fed Chairman Ben Bernanke has repeatedly stated that he is confident the central bank has the tools to prevent inflation, and will be monitoring the buyback program for any signs of nascent inflation. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
